SELECT GRP_CD as grpCd, -- // 그룹코드 -- PK CMN_CD as cmnCd, -- // 공통코드 -- PK CMN_CDNM as cmnCdnm, -- // 공통코드명 SYS_ID as sysId, -- // 시스템 ID [ B:예산관리, S:시스템관리 ]
RMK as rmk, -- // 비고 SORT_SEQ as sortSeq, -- // 순번 USYN as usyn, -- // 사용여부 CD_SETT_VL1 as cdSettVl1, -- // 참조1 CD_SETT_VL2 as cdSettVl2, -- // 참조2 CD_SETT_VL3 as cdSettVl3, -- // 참조3 CD_SETT_VL4 as cdSettVl4, -- // 참조4 CD_SETT_VL5 as cdSettVl5, -- // 참조5 CD_SETT_VL6 as cdSettVl6, -- // 참조6 CD_SETT_VL7 as cdSettVl7 -- // 참조7 FROM SCC_CMN_CD WHERE 1=1
AND GRP_CD LIKE '%' || #{grpCd} || '%'
ORDER BY SORT_SEQ;
